languages.text: "Она клянется в вечной верности и, кажется, знает, за какой конец клинка держаться, чтобы им размахивать". {n}Маражай пренебрежительно взмахивает рукой.{/n} "Одной мон-кай в свите больше, одной меньше..."
"She swears eternal loyalty and seems to know which end of the blade to hold when swinging it around." {n}Marazhai makes a dismissive gesture.{/n} "One more mon-keigh in the retinue, one less..."
languages.original_text: "Она клянется в вечной верности и, кажется, знает, за какой конец клинка держаться, чтобы им размахивать". {n}Маражай пренебрежительно взмахивает рукой.{/n} "Одной мон-кай в свите больше, одной меньше..."

traits.locale_text: "She swears eternal loyalty and seems to know which end of the blade to hold so she can swing it around." {n}Marazhai makes a dismissive gesture.{/n} "One more mon'keigh in the entourage, one less..."

languages.text: «Jura lealtad eterna y parece saber qué parte de la espada sostener para blandirla». {n}Marazhai hace un gesto desdeñoso.{/n} «Un mon-keigh más que menos en tu séquito...».
languages.original_text: "She swears eternal loyalty and seems to know which end of the blade to hold when swinging it around." {n}Marazhai makes a dismissive gesture.{/n} "One more mon-keigh in the retinue, one less..."

traits.locale_text: «Jura lealtad eterna y parece saber qué parte de la espada sostener para blandirla». {n}Marazhai hace un gesto desdeñoso.{/n} «Un mon'keigh más que menos en tu séquito...».

languages.text: 「彼女は永遠の忠誠を誓い、刃を振り回すときにどちらの端を持てばいいかを知っているようです」{n}マラズハイは呆れたようなジェスチャーをする。 {/n}「従者にモン＝ケイが一人増え、一人減った…」
languages.original_text: "She swears eternal loyalty and seems to know which end of the blade to hold when swinging it around." {n}Marazhai makes a dismissive gesture.{/n} "One more mon-keigh in the retinue, one less..."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女は永遠の忠誠を誓い、刃を振り回すときにどちらの端を持てばいいかを知っているようです」{n}マラズハイは呆れたようなジェスチャーをする。 {/n}「従者にモンケイが一人増え、一人減った…」

languages.text: “她发誓永远忠诚，而且她挥舞战刀的时候，好像也很清楚该握哪边。”{n}玛拉斋做了个不屑一顾的手势。{/n}“随行人员中又多了只猴子，少了个……”
languages.original_text: "She swears eternal loyalty and seems to know which end of the blade to hold when swinging it around." {n}Marazhai makes a dismissive gesture.{/n} "One more mon-keigh in the retinue, one less..."

traits.locale_text: “她发誓永远忠诚，而且她挥舞战刀的时候，好像也很清楚该握哪边。”{n}玛拉斋做了个不屑一顾的手势。{/n}“随行人员中又多了只猴子，少了个……”

languages.text: "Sie schwört ewige Loyalität und scheint zu wissen, wie man ein Schwert halten muss, wenn man damit zuschlägt." {n}Marazhai macht eine abwertende Geste.{/n} "Ein Chem-Pan-Sey mehr im Gefolge oder einer weniger ..."
languages.original_text: "She swears eternal loyalty and seems to know which end of the blade to hold when swinging it around." {n}Marazhai makes a dismissive gesture.{/n} "One more mon-keigh in the retinue, one less..."

traits.locale_text: "Sie schwört ewige Loyalität und scheint zu wissen, wie man ein Schwert halten muss, wenn man damit zuschlägt." {n}Marazhai macht eine abwertende Geste.{/n} "Ein Chem-Pan-Sey mehr im Gefolge oder einer weniger ..."

languages.text: « Elle vous jure fidélité éternelle et semble savoir par quel bout tenir une lame. {n}Marazhai esquisse un geste désinvolte.{/n} Après tout, une mon-keigh de plus ou de moins dans votre entourage... »
languages.original_text: "She swears eternal loyalty and seems to know which end of the blade to hold when swinging it around." {n}Marazhai makes a dismissive gesture.{/n} "One more mon-keigh in the retinue, one less..."

traits.locale_text: « Elle vous jure fidélité éternelle et semble savoir par quel bout tenir une lame. {n}Marazhai esquisse un geste désinvolte.{/n} Après tout, une mon'keigh de plus ou de moins dans votre entourage... »

languages.text: "Ebedî sadakat yeminleri ediyor. Kılıcını sallarken hangi ucundan tutacağını da iyi biliyor gibi." {n}Marazhai, eliyle kibirli bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "Maiyete bir mon-keigh daha katılmış, belki de..."
languages.original_text: "She swears eternal loyalty and seems to know which end of the blade to hold when swinging it around." {n}Marazhai makes a dismissive gesture.{/n} "One more mon-keigh in the retinue, one less..."
